title: League won't even go to login screen... :(
body: Every time League is opened the login screen does not come up, but a message ," PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working."  I have uninstalled and reinstalled at least 5 times as well as deleted all league files upon receiving this message.  No further information is given in the message other than saying it would try to find a solution...  Please help.

replies.body: The kernel error is usually cause by a settings or program that's blocking the patcher from launching.  Go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  Let me know if you have any questions.
